name: Your Perfect Morning
description: Looking to bring shine back into your morning routine? Typically comes with a beautiful visual element like a spreadsheet or moodboard to help you stick to your ritual/routine.

name: Dream Closet Moodboard
description: Thinking of trying a new style but can't decide how? This bite comes with a beautiful moodboard to help you manifest your future aesthetic!

name: Your Main Character Outfit
summary: Find your very own main character outfit
description: Allow yourself to be in your most authentic and powerful state. Typically comes with a beautiful visual element like a spreadsheet or moodboard to help your outfit feel special!

name: Try Something New
description: Break out of the mold with this exciting bite! Typically comes with a planning session and future support to help you go through with it.

name: Your Portable Safe Space
summary: Plan and create a safe space to-go kit, so you can feel secure wherever and whenever! Typically comes with a beautiful visual element like a spreadsheet or moodboard to help you build your kit, as well as support in finding the items online or in stores.

name: Super Secret Bite
summary: This bite deals with the edge case of secret bites in our database
